attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: imposed on this country's workforce by the European Union.It denies all hardworking people the choice of how much and or little overtime  they can work,to the detriment of their families.It gives an unfair advantage to other EU states that don't enforce it.The extra hours that could be worked are now being worked by eu migrants at much lower rates of pay on offer to the uk workforce.
